plot: The Life and Death of Darryl Kile looks back at Kile's All-Star career, his reputation as a great teammate and family man, and how his death impacted the Cardinals' play throughout the rest of the 2002 season.
title: The Life and Death of Darryl Kile
plot_es: The Life and Death of Darryl Kile looks back at Kile's All-Star career, his reputation as a great teammate and family man, and how his death impacted the Cardinals' play throughout the rest of the 2002 season.
original_name: The Life and Death of Darryl Kile
